name: Hit Game
description:
Hi! I made a simple game to learn Unity and the programming language C#

You basically need to hit the monster when they come out of their ''boxes'' by pressing the keys 1,2,3,8,9,0. Try to hit them as soon as possible! Also, don't miss or the game is over. Space to restart and ESC to close the game easily.

Beat my highscore I have 280 (:

The game is made with love.
